title: website: release history for Go 1.5.x sorted differently
body:
The point releases for go1.5.N sort descending, with 1.5.2 coming before 1.5.1:

https://golang.org/doc/devel/release.html#go1.5.minor

For Go 1.4, Go 1.3, etc it's the other way around:

https://golang.org/doc/devel/release.html#go1.4.minor

/cc @broady who I can't assign yet (invite pending)
